column4: Hello, I have 2 problems if anyone can help. Ok, can a ubuntu laptop pick up a Windows AD HOC network, and, how can i make a updaye from 7.04 to 8.04 faster?
td123 my laptop wont go above 800x600 res and when im on 7.04 it can
Well, here a better question. Can i add resolutions to ubuntu 8.04
Yes, most likely your problem with not having the correct resolution is a driver issue though
im not on ubuntu, havn't installed it yet.
So you were just having a problem getting the correct resolution on the LiveCD?
no, I have installed it before, i could never get it above the 800x600 res,

Odd, perhaps try your 7.04 xorg.conf in 8.10, did you check if 8.04 was using the "intel" driver, if not then changing the driver from "vesa" to "intel" in your xorg.conf should do the trick, like you were asking before, also as you were asking, you can manually specify a resolution in your xorg.conf but that should not be necessary
OK, I can also just as easily help from the LiveCD so you don't have to commit if you can't get it working
alright. give me a hour be back on
OK, I may or may not be here
